name: MEMENTO MORI.
description:
MEMENTO MORI is a simple 2D platformer walking simulator with an unusual mechanic. Play through a person's life and memories, in the past and present; memories of death, tragedy and the passing of time.

by cjbarron 

Music by The White Piano Key: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l554mG2laCM

Extra Art Assets by lavvis: https://opengameart.org/content/2d-pixel-city-pack
